A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Everything you could ask for in a Star Wars movie. This film is filled with action packed\, emotional\, and jaw-dropping scenes. The only flaw I saw in particular is a certain sub-plot that follows Finn and Rose. It feels a little too drawn out\, and kind of forced in at some parts. It could definitely be edited down a bit. Other than that I have nothing else bad to say about The Last Jedi. Everything else was done either very well or flawlessly.
